description.english: Build and improve the empire with the help of your people. Reach 1000 number of Citizens resource.
Use the knowledge and curiosity of your best scholars. Complete research of 1 technology.
Bring knowledge and wisdom to your nation. Complete the research of all technologies in the Invention tree.
The greatest city of your empire will become the centre of the world! Build a city of size 8.
Happy people give no trouble. Reach 150% Happiness resource.
Your men will die for you! Reach the Excellent level of army morale with any player.
Keep your granaries full! Reach threshold of 30 food per turn.
Steady income in the state coffers allows you to plan ahead. Reach surplus of 30 gold per turn.
Your name has already reached all corners of the Mediterranean. Reach surplus of 20 influence points per turn.
Work for prosperity. Establish 3 trade routes.
Build a worthy place where theory and science can meet. Build an Academy in 1 of your cities.
Open the gates of your cities to merchants from far and wide. Build Trading improvement in 10 of your cities.
Protect your cities! Build any type of fortification improvements (stockade, palisade, city walls) in 10 of your cities.
Men with special training are always needed! Give 3 of your military units at least 3 improvements each.
Show your political genius. Merge with 1 nation in a confederation.
Plan your political strategy. Merge with 1 nation in a federation.
Weak will be swallowed by the mighty! Sign an absorption agreement with 1 nation.
Your men have to trust you! Try to boost the army morale with any opponent by using one of the army morale tools (prophecy, strategic review, speach, propaganda).
If you cannot break in, let them starve! Lay a successful siege to 1 city until it surrenders.
Spare your men and reach your goals another way! Lay a successful siege to 3 cities until they surrender.
Use other sources than military to reach your goals! Take over 1 foreign city by successfully applying influence on it.
Grass is always greener on the other side of the fence. Take 5 foreign cities by successfully applying influence on them.
Expand your sphere of influence. Take control over 10 foreign cities by applying influence on them.
Rule or be ruled! Conquer another nation.
Let no-one doubt your desire to rule the world! Conquer 3 nations.
Push relentlessly through the defense lines. Seize a capital city of another nation.
Take one city and others will soon follow! Take 1 foreign city in a battle.
The true power lies in the cities. Conquer 5 foreign cities.
Every city won on the enemy makes him weaker and you stronger! Conquer 10 foreign cities.
Fortuna favors the brave. Attack and destroy 1 enemy infantry or cavalry unit in a battle.
Trust your men on the battlefield. Attack and destroy 5 enemy infantry or cavalry units in military engagements.
Never fear the enemy! Attack and destroy 10 enemy infantry or cavalry units in military engagements.
Ram and sink enemy ships! Attack and destroy 1 enemy vessel in a naval battle.
Let the Gods guide your ships. Attack and destroy 5 enemy vessels in naval engagements.
The depths of the sea are waiting for your enemies! Destroy 10 enemy vessels in naval engagements.
Small or big - the country needs towns and cities! Build 1 city.
Towns and cities are natural centers of culture, learning and commerce. Build 5 cities.
Your rule relies on cities! Build 10 cities.
Mighty heroes boast many scars! Reach 100% experience points with at least 1 unit.
Write your name into historical annals! Win 1 game by completing any victory condition.
Join the club of masters! Win 3 games by completing any victory condition.
Use the riches of the lands by cultivating them. Build 3 fields or farms.
Improve the infrastructure of your empire. Build 1 Settler.
Fields, roads, bridges - the tasks are endless. Build 10 Settler units.
War is their daily bread. Build 1 advanced ground military unit.
Stronger, faster, unbeatable. Build 1 expert ground military unit.
Keep up with the advancements of military techniques. Build 5 advanced ground military units.
Create the strongest army in the world! Build 5 expert ground military units.
All capable men should be ready to take up arms! Build 10 military units of any type.
Call your men to their duty! Build 20 military units of any type.
Keep the resource production high! Get 5 mines (gold, coal, iron, stones) to reach size 3 (by connecting them to a blacksmith(s) and city(ies) with paved roads.
Give it a chance! Clock 1 hour of gameplay.
Nothing comes easy in life. Clock 10 hours of gameplay and show a real dedication.
Wisdom comes with age and experience! Complete 100 hours of gameplay.
Just one more turn! Play the game at least an hour every day for one week.
Purpose justifies the means! Successfully employ piracy against another player(s) at least once.
Win by completing all 5 victory conditions in the campaign map.
Open your mind to the lessons of the wise! Complete simple tutorial for any one of these nations – Roman Empire, Carthage, Ptolemaic Empire
Win a game by completing any victory condition playing as one of the empires of the campaign map – Roman Empire, Carthage, Seleucid Empire, Ptolemaic Empire

Win a game by completing any victory condition playing as one of the small kingdoms in the campaign map– Kingdom of Ardiaei, Epirus, Athens, Sparta, Antigonid kingdom, Macedon, Bospran, Pontus, Pergamon

Win a game by completing any of the victory conditons playing as one of the Barbarian nations in the campaign map – Iberia tribes, Gallaeci tribes, Massilia, Celtic tribes, German tribes, Odrysian kingdom, Dacian tribes)
Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Noob difficulty.
Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Beginner difficulty.
Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Easy difficulty.
Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Medium difficulty.
Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing for any nation of the campaign map on Hard difficulty.
Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Legendary difficulty.
Win a game by completing any of the victory conditions playing as any nation of the campaign map on Heroic difficulty.
Keep the abacus at hand - win a game by completing the Winning points victory condition playing as any nation of the campaign map.
Take up the challenge - win a game by completing the Overall victory condition playing as any nation of the campaign map.
Rule and police the world - win a game by completing the Military superiority victory condition playing as any nation of the campaign map.
Think, discover, prove - win a game by completing the Technological dominance victory condition playing as any nation of the campaign map.
Cultivate the strengths of your people - win a game by completing the Country development victory condition playing as any nation of the campaign map.
Stronger starting position means stronger opponents! Survive 150 turns playing as one of the empires in the campaign map – Roman Empire, Carthage, Seleucid Empire, Ptolemaic Empire

Win your place in the sun or die in the shadows. Survive 100 turns playing as one of the small kingdoms in the campaign map– Kingdom of Ardiaei, Epirus, Athens, Sparta, Antigonid kingdom, Macedon, Bospran, Pontus, Pergamon

Pit your strength against the strongest. Survive 50 turns playing as one of the Barbarian nations in the campaign map – Iberia tribes, Gallaeci tribes, Massilia, Celtic tribes, German tribes, Odrysian kingdom, Dacian tribes
Train minds can come up with unusual ideas! Build a Philosophy school improvement in 5 cities.
Take the leap of faith. Use any of the State decisions at least once.
Become a master of a federation or confederation of 3 players in the campaign map.
Realistic goals can lead to grand victory. Complete all objectives in 1 game playing as any nation in the campaign map
Win a game in the campaign map by completing any of the victory conditions in 200 turns.
Win a game in the campaign map by completing any of the victory conditions in 150 turns.
Win a game in the campaign map by completing any of the victory conditions in 100 turns.
As Roman Empire complete the objective City of Carthago - be the first one to conquer the mighty city (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Epirus complete the objective Antigonid - defeat the Antigonid kingdom and claim the throne of Macedon for yourself (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Carthage complete the objective City of Roma - seize the Roman metropolis (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Sparta complete the objective Roman allies - forge a military alliance with Roman Empire (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Athens complete the objective City walls - re-build the old fortifications in the city of Athens (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Gallaeci Tribes complete the objective Iberia - conquer the Iberian peninsula before other nations (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Antigonid complete the objective Byzantium - take the city and unite the Macedonian empire again.
As Ardiaei complete the objective Alliance - forge a close military alliance with Epirus.
As Macedon complete the objective Odrysian campaing - lead your armies north and take the barbarian city of Seuthopolis in 20 turns.
As Seleucid Empire complete the objective Syria - claim the territories of Syria and Judae for your empire (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Ptolemaic Empire complete the objective Syria - get the territory of Syria under your control (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Pontus complete the objective Pergamon - conquer the neighboring Pergamon.
As Massilia complete the objective Celtic conquest - lead a campaign against the Celts until they surrender or die (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Bospran complete the objective Trading outpost - establish a stronghold in Asia Minor (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Pergamon complete the objective Democracy - lead your nation towards Democracy government.
As German Tribes complete the objective Expansion south - lead your men south and take the coastal city Rhizon (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Iberain Tribes complete the objective Norhtern Iberia - explore and conquer regions in the north (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Odrysian kingdom complete the objective Region of Thrace - claim the territory of Thrace for your people (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Celtic Tribes complete the objective City of Massilia - lead a campaign to the south and take the prospering city of Massilia (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
As Dacian Tribes complete the objective Germanic threat - stand up to the tribes in the west, there could be only one winner (not all objectives are unlocked from the beginning).
